tag_list: sridhar-g, sridhar, sri, yulop, bangalore, bengaluru, cityfind, sridhar-gundaiah
overview:
“A web evangelist, an avid admirer of technology, one who brings innovation to a new spectrum along with his expertise in building web products,add to this a strong communication skills.

A post graduate in Internet Technology and e-commerce from University of Greenwich [London], Sri brings in work experience from companies such as EDS and Yellowtag.

A energetic and a Distinguished Entrepreneur, Sri specializes in spinning up new technologies and brings his expertise in building web products, Integration solutions and working for Investment banking products. Sri is part of many social services and has been actively involved in building community activities.”

(Source: Sridhar Gundaiah)
